full_record.present_illness_positive: ___ yo F with chronic migraines managed by the pain center who  presented to the ED with severe migraine. When she goes to the  ED she typically receives decadron, zofran and dilaudid which  relieves her migraine. Today her migraine returned after 3 doses  of dilaudid which is very rare. She has also noted sinusitis for  the last couple months and has had augmentin and azithromycin  without resolu
full_record.present_illness_negative: denies any other symptom. without resolution.
